entries.title: Cloudscape Design System
entries.description: Cloudscape offers user interface guidelines, front-end components, design resources, and development tools for building intuitive, engaging, and inclusive user experiences at scale. It was built for and is used by Amazon Web Services (AWS) products and services.

entries.title: W2UI
entries.description: W2UI is a modern JavaScript UI library for building rich web applications. It aims to let you define your UI in a declarative way via JSON data structures.
